idea: SAG Chem LLP - Complete solution provider with specialized complex organic small molecules. We are leading manufacturer of Impurity standards, Speciality chemicals and more. We have a strong commitment towards improving our quality systems, to deliver products that meet and exceed the needs of our customers.

idea:
We are a sustainable fashion accessory brand.


BEEJ was born from a growing awareness of how ‘Fast-Fashion’ and non-discriminate use of materials that are harmful to the environment are hurting our planet and destroying it at an alarmingly rapid pace. 


BEEJ creates accessories made from sustainable / upcycled materials.
name: LYKKE SUSTAINABLE DESIGNS PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
Who are we
We are a growing company in online commercial property space. While there are ample of commercial properties to fit every business need, it does not reach the right audience. While there is huge focus on housing demand we focus only on the commercial space. We help businesses to get the right property. We take efforts to ensure the listing is accurate and simple so that buyers are confident before taking the next step.
We assist you in finding property, be it buying or renting (leasing) in following areas - showroom space, shops, warehouses, farm lands, factory lands, factories, office space, co-working offices, large offices, mall space and many more.
Vision
Connecting business to every possible commercial property.
Mission
To become the trusted choice for commercial property sellers and buyers.
name: REAL SQUARE VALUE
